price: (48) And there will appear to them the evils they had earned, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyiātu mā kasabū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
